article_metadata.description: The City of Ridgecrest, represented by Mayor Peggy Breeden, developer Jim Gregory and Ridgecrest Regional CEO Jim Suver were honored with awards at the at the Kern Council of Governments Regional Awards of Merit Program Thursday night at the Seven Oaks Country Club in Bakersfield. Ridgecrest was recognized for the West Ridgecrest Boulevard Reconstruction Project and Gregory for his work at revitalizing the Village Retreat Apartments.
